name: 1,1':4',1''-Terphenyl
Reason: 1,1':4',1''-Terphenyl has a melting point of 205°C due to the presence of two additional phenyl rings linked in a linear fashion, which enhances the crystalline structure and molecular weight. Each additional phenyl group can be estimated to add approximately 100°C to the melting point due to increased pi-pi interactions, rigidity, and molecular weight.
